like.question: I will do my best to help you find the answers to all your questions.
like.talkUnderstand: talk to someone who can hear me out and understand me
like.dealAnxiety: deal with my stress and anxiety

who.title: Who is Yurii Primush
who.text: My name is Yurii Primush. I’m a human being, a man, an explorer, an adventurer, an entrepreneur, an investor, a coach, and a mentor. I enjoy diving deep into new experiences.
who.text1: I believe that every one of us can open our potential to the fullest and become happier by accepting our imperfections. By doing that we have a chance to unlock our full potential.
who.text2: I also believe that relationships – within teams, with clients, and relationships in general between people – are our most valuable asset. Working in the finance technology sector for almost 10 years I have gained great experience in commercial, technical and operational business skills. I enjoy working with talented and creative people who are good at developing technical business solutions.  As a partner and co-founder, I launched several successful fin-tech projects over the years.
who.text3: However, since 2017 my focus has been on personal development: I have 5 years of experience in psychotherapy as a client. Since 2017 I have studied the life and business coaching and I have been learning from the best while putting this into practice with business teams and as a private coach.
who.text4: My goal is to make the World a better place through innovation and technology while building awareness and protecting the environment.  If you have the same goals, let us connect and create new synergies together.
who.text5: Feel free to follow also my social media pages.

why.title: Who is Yurii Primush
why.text1: My name is Yurii Primush. I’m a human being, a man, an explorer, an adventurer, an entrepreneur, an investor, a coach, and a mentor. I enjoy diving deep into new experiences.

activities.title: MY ACTIVITIES
activities.mentorText: Venture Mentoring Service (VMS) of the University of Luxembourg Incubator helps University’s entrepreneurs turn their ideas into a real business. Under the license of MIT, VMS provides tailored support and industry experts to suit every venture’s needs regardless of their level of experience and stage. My role is to mentor selected VMS startups
activities.member: Member of Luxembourg Business Angel Network (LBAN)
activities.memberText: LBAN unlocks the potential of private investors and helps entrepreneurs to thrive, in Luxembourg and beyond

links.title: What people say about Yurii
links.text: Here you can find some articles, videos, and other materials that have caught my attention.

form.title: Contact me
form.text1: Yurii Primush is an experienced, well-trained, certified coach who works with private individuals and various organizations (especially entrepreneurs and start-ups) both in Europe and the US.
form.text2: Both online and offline coaching sessions are offered. For more information please contact:
